UC1.name: UAV Canyelles Vineyard Dataset 2023-04-21
UC1.author: Paula Osés, Oriol Arroyo, Aldo Sollazzo, Chirag Rangholia
UC1.description: Crop monitoring dataset that contains RGB images, pointcloud data, an orthomosaic image and the DEM.

UC1.name: UAV Canyelles Vineyard Dataset 2023-04-28
UC1.author: Esther Vera, Paula Osés, Oriol Arroyo, Aldo Sollazzo, Chirag Rangholia
UC1.description: Crop monitoring dataset that contains RGB images, pointcloud data, an orthomosaic image and the DEM.

UC1.name: UAV Canyelles Vineyard Dataset 2023-05-05
UC1.author: Esther Vera, Oriol Arroyo, Aldo Sollazzo, Chirag Rangholia, Paula Osés
UC1.description: Crop monitoring dataset that contains RGB images, pointcloud data, an orthomosaic image and the DEM.

UC1.name: UAV Canyelles Vineyard Dataset 2023-06-09
UC1.author: Esther Vera, Oriol Arroyo, Aldo Sollazzo, Chirag Rangholia, Paula Osés
UC1.description: Crop monitoring dataset that contains RGB images, NIR images, pointcloud data, RGB and NDVI orthomosaic images, DEM and the shape that defines the total vineyard terrain.

UC1.name: UC1 DATA FOLDER GITHUB
UC1.author: Esther Vera, Aldo Sollazzo, Chirag Rangholia
UC1.description: This dataset contains the necessary data to execute the UC1_Crop_Monitoring codes in GitHub.

UC2.name: UAV Spraying Parameters-Coverage in Vineyards
UC2.author: Vasilis Psiroukis
UC2.description: A set of UAV spraying data collected using WSPs, across different parameter configurations.

UC3.name: Drone raw images of cattle in french grazing areas
UC3.author: Adrien Lebreton
UC3.description: The dataset encompasses around 900 raw .jpeg drone images of grazing areas where cattle graze collected between June and August 2023.

UC3.name: Sheep videos taken from drone at low altitude
UC3.author: Adrien Lebreton, Louise Helary
UC3.description: The dataset encompasses 16 .MP4 videos from drone (DJI mavic 3 Enterprise or Thermal) of around 50 sheep crossing a gate.

UC3.name: Drone images and their annotations of grazing cows
UC3.author: Adrien Lebreton, Louise Helary
UC3.description: It contains 1385 images and 4941 bounding boxes of cows taken with a DJI Pilot 2 drone. This dataset is a major contribution for public and research stakeholders to develop cow detection and counting models.

UC3.name: Drone videos and their annotations of passing sheep (for counting purpose)
UC3.author: Louise Helary, Kinsey Nnenna, Marta KOLODZIEJCZYK, Jana SCHEWE, Léa Philip, Estelle Nicolas, Adrien Lebreton
UC3.description: The dataset encompasses 4 .MP4 videos from drone (DJI mavic 3 Enterprise or Thermal) of around 50 sheep crossing a gate.

UC4.name: Forestry and Biodiversity monitoring in Lithuania with hyperspectral camera and UAV
UC4.author: ART21
UC4.description: Hyperspectral imaging acquired with UAV on different dates of a pine tree forest.

OCT - AgroTwin.name: UAV AgroTwin Vineyard Dataset 2024
OCT - AgroTwin.author: Simone Kartsiotis, Antonio Donnangelo
OCT - AgroTwin.description: The datasets contains RGB images and pointclouds of a vineyard field.
